title: No Refuge (4R29)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. While a [Dunland] Man is stacked on a site, the Shadow number of each site is +5.
Lore:	As their homes were ravaged by the wild men, refugees fled to the safety of Helm's Deep.
Rarity:	R
